Issue.creator: scottz
Issue.summary: GO SDK changes to allow running tests in pre-existing remote networks
Issue.description: Some of our tests for consensus and ledger stress tests are written in GO, and use a GO SDK which creates a local network, given networkcredentials file. This task is for implementing changes to the GO SDK functions that will allow the option to run the same tests in non-local (external) networks that may even already exist.
